name: Farid Kakar
story: Mustafa Takhtar grew up in a small village in Iran. His father was a sharpshooter in the Iranian military, and he passed on his skills to Mustafa at an early age. Mustafa joined the military as soon as he was able, and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional marksmanship. He was eventually recruited by OPFOR, and now serves as a sharpshooter for their operations in the Middle East.
